Definition:  Child Born of the Marriage
The term
child born of the marriage
, for purposes of the marriage dates requirement in
38 CFR 3.54
, includes a fetus advanced to the point of gestation required to constitute a birth under the law of the jurisdiction in which the fetus was delivered.
Note
:  If this issue arises, it may be necessary to request a District Counsel opinion.
Reference
:  For more information on requesting a legal opinion, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.3.d-e
.
